description: This Java class 'AccountService' provides methods to access and retrieve bank and utility account data from repositories. It uses mappers to convert entity objects to DTOs and handles entity not found exceptions.

classes.name: AccountService
classes.description: Service class for handling account-related operations, such as fetching bank and utility accounts via repositories and mappers.

methods.name: readBankAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a bank account by its account number, converting the entity to a DTO.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a utility account by provider name, converting the entity to a DTO.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a utility account by its ID, converting the entity to a DTO.
